author: Simon Difford
description: Named due to this drink's friendly approachability and The Persuaders!, a 1970s British TV series starring Tony Curtis and Roger Moore made brilliant by John Barry's theme music. This cocktail harnesses rum's affinity to pineapple juice and is Daiquiri-like but with white wine's acidity replacing that of lime juice. Chinotto liqueur adds delicate chocolaty citrus complexity with a touch of rich vanilla liqueur adding balancing sweetness.
name: The Persuader
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
5 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
